summary: When gifted magician Bobo finds himself assailed by hallucinations and seeks professional help, he learns he's being haunted by a sinister spirit.
cast: Emraan Hashmi|Konkona Sen Sharma|Kalki Koechlin|Huma Qureshi|Pavan Malhotra|Rajatabha Dutta|Visshesh Tiwari|Sara Arjun|Bhavesh Balchandani|Pallavi Batra|Shirina Sambyal|Deepak Dhadwal|Habib|Kanupriya Gupta|Prem Parmar|Vidyadhar Karmakar|Deepali Pansare|Punam Sawhney|Sanobar|Pooja Jhaveri|Tammana Singh|Nitin Singh|Ragini Dixit|Subash Singh|Sakshi|Jatin Sial|Ravi Kachhawa|Rupali Pagare|Tripathi Ankur|Kannan Iyer|Vikas Shrivastav|Parlav Chaudhary|Diksha Lalwani|Sanya Monga|Sakshi Monga|Shikha Rahi|Rahil Patel|Aditya Nimbalkar|Aalaap Majgavkar|Ankita Jha|Faraaz Salim|Taha Anwer|Ishaan Pohoomul|Adhiraj Bose|Roald Smeets
title: Ek Thi Daayan
